attributes.additional_details: When elections took place, the people of the United Kingdom voted for Boris Johnson, they did not vote for the 2 candidates that now have the change to rule the country. We should have the option to vote for the person/party that speaks on behalf of us.
attributes.background: I feel we should hold a general election as the people of the United Kingdom did not vote for Rishi Sunak or Liz Truss. I feel the people of the United Kingdom deserve to have their say regarding who should run our country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

At a general election constituents vote for their local MP, not the Prime Minister, but we could accept a petition calling on the Government to require that the Prime Minister be elected by a public vote, if that's what you want to happen.
